SEARCH
Package domain

Class VerlaufVerwaltung

java.lang.Object
domain.VerlaufVerwaltung
public class VerlaufVerwaltung extends Object
Manages operations and history related to articles , including loading, sorting, saving events, and filtering operations based on specific criteria.

      Records an event related to an operation on an article by a user.

      operation - the operation performed
      artikel - the article involved in the operation
      quantity - the quantity of the article involved
      nutzer - the user performing the operation

    • kundeEreignisfesthalten

      Parameters:

      authuser - the authenticated user (customer)
